comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/42400804@N05] Thanks for the suggestions Renira1. It does look quite a bit like him, but it is unlikely to be him. This looks like a family portrait, and Robert Helpmann never married or had children. Alas, the search continues...
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons

comment._content: The father has a strong look of a young James Cagney?

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/swordscookie] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/42400804@N05] Hmmm, I see the resemblance with James Cagney, something in the eyes. Renira1, if only this was a portrait of the famous two dancers. It would add nicely to their famous wedding photograph at St Mary's Cathedral in Sydney:
